Package de.stocker.model.dataWrappers

Class BollingerBand

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.stocker.model.dataWrappers.PaintableChartComponent
      • de.stocker.model.dataWrappers.BollingerBand
  • public class BollingerBand
extends PaintableChartComponent
    The Class BollingerBand contains all information of a Bollinger Band indicator object: the values of the Bollinger Bands, the Simple Moving Average and the parameters used to calculate them.
    Author:
    Matthias Rudolph

      Instantiates a new Bollinger Band object with the specified parameters for storing all indicator components.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BollingerBand

        public BollingerBand​(double f,
                     int n,
                     double[] movingAvg,
                     double[] upperBollingerBand,
                     double[] lowerBollingerBand)
        Instantiates a new Bollinger Band object with the specified parameters for storing all indicator components.
        Parameters:
        f - the standard deviation factor f
        n - n determines the period of the moving average used to calculate the Bollinger Bands
        movingAvg - the array of Simple Moving Average values
        upperBollingerBand - the array containing the values of the upper Bollinger Band
        lowerBollingerBand - the array containing the values of the lower Bollinger Band

    • Method Detail

      • getUpperBollingerBand

        public double[] getUpperBollingerBand()
        Gets an array of upper Bollinger Band values. The array is as long as the default candle draw amount, thus containing a Bollinger value for every painted data point.
        Returns:
        the array of upper Bollinger Band values

      • getLowerBollingerBand

        public double[] getLowerBollingerBand()
        Gets an array of lower Bollinger Band values. The array is as long as the default candle draw amount, thus containing a Bollinger value for every painted data point.
        Returns:
        the array of lower Bollinger Band values

      • getMovingAvg

        public double[] getMovingAvg()
        Gets an array of Simple Moving Average values. The array is as long as the default candle draw amount, thus containing a Moving Average value for every painted data point.
        Returns:
        the array of Simple Moving Average values

      • getMinPrice

        public double getMinPrice()
        Gets the minimum price of this indicator object, used to fix the scale of the chart frame.
        Returns:
        the minimum price of this indicator object

      • getMaxPrice

        public double getMaxPrice()
        Gets the maximum price of this indicator object, used to fix the scale of the chart frame.
        Returns:
        the maximum price of this indicator object

      • getF

        public double getF()
        Gets the standard deviation factor f used to calculate the Bollinger Band values.
        Returns:
        the standard deviation factor f

      • getN

        public int getN()
        Gets the integer n stating the period over which the Simple Moving Average is calculated, used to calculate the Bollinger Band values.
        Returns:
        the period n

      • getLabelText

        public java.lang.String getLabelText()
        Gets the label text, detailing the name and parameters of the indicator object.
        Returns:
        the label text

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overriding the toString() method. This is used to conveniently print the indicator name and details, e. g. in the list of active indicators in a chart frame.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the label text
